net.sf.hibernate.expression
Class Example

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.hibernate.expression.AbstractCriterion
      net.sf.hibernate.expression.Example
All Implemented Interfaces:
Criterion
public class Example
extends AbstractCriterion

Support for query by example. 

 List results = session.createCriteria(Parent.class)
     .add( Example.create(parent).ignoreCase() )
     .createCriteria("child")
         .add( Example.create( parent.getChild() ) )
     .list();
"Examples" may be mixed and matched with "Expressions" in the same Criteria.

Author:
Gavin King
See Also:
Criteria
